body: Uhm, hate to be a party pooper, and I love this manga, but mans broke the golden rule: "don't stick your dick in crazy", she manipulated him for months on end and pretended to commit suicide, so that's pretty damn close to crazy
A fine addition to my collection.
@ss4chris Some girls accidently break their hymen before having sex (it can also break due to sex toys), so that might have happened to her.
im confused. never had a bf but not a virgin? lol
@Evidenox tfw you fap but you need a plot
@Evidenox Maybe she was just tired of life. Who knows.

maybe she was alone lol.....even a million book you read about girl , you will never understand..... well its 10/10 (quality waifu+good story).....please make more sensei T.T, im waiting for the next you published ^,^
I think she wanted his attention from the start.

So what was she doing at the window? why did she need consoling? If you're going to make the story be that she needed consoling because of an Ex but then not explain it when she announces she never had one it makes my dick angry. I know I'm taking this too seriously but it's really glaring.
If I were the dude, I'd be 1000x happier! Women really love complicating things...
I don't think he will mind all that much that she never had a boyfriend.
